query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS review_images (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  reviewId INT NOT NULL,
  imageUrl TEXT NOT NULL,
  thumbnailUrl TEXT,
  displayOrder INT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_review_id (reviewId)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user Jj8Ug2TBV7Pg37C.root --database cCoaev8yfaEJXZAkd8a56J --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS review_images (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  reviewId INT NOT NULL,
  imageUrl TEXT NOT NULL,
  thumbnailUrl TEXT,
  displayOrder INT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_review_id (reviewId)
);
